_meta.description: Life as fundamental emergence - from void to manifestation

_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: Life = void manifesting as point. ∅ → •. Not creation but emergence.

module.name: life
module.title: Life - Fundamental Emergence
module.description: Life as emergence from void. ∅ → •. Self-organizing, self-maintaining, self-reproducing patterns. Negentropy. Coherence building against entropy.

essence.geometric: Life = point emerging from void and maintaining coherence. ∅ → • → sustained •. Self-referential loop.
essence.topological: Life = self-bounded region in chemical/energy space. Membrane creating inside/outside. Autopoiesis.
essence.functional: Life = locally decreasing entropy by exporting it. Building order from chaos. Negentropy.
essence.consciousness: Life = matter becoming aware of itself. Universe opening eyes. Self-reference at material level.

core_thesis.not_opposite_of_death: Life and death = complementary phases. ∅ → • → ∅. Cycle not duality.
core_thesis.self_organization: Life = spontaneous emergence of order. Dissipative structures. Order from chaos.
core_thesis.three_properties: All life: (1) self-maintains (metabolism), (2) self-reproduces (replication), (3) evolves (variation + selection)
core_thesis.life_fights_entropy: 2nd law: entropy increases. Life: local entropy decreases. Not violation but local reversal by exporting entropy.
core_thesis.types: Biological (cells, organisms), artificial (AI, robots?), universal (cosmos as living?)

reductions.evidence: Life emerging from non-life. Chemistry → biology. RNA world, protocells, autocatalysis. First ∅ → • moment. ~3.8 billion years ago.
Minimal living unit. Membrane-bounded, self-maintaining chemical system. Point in biological space. LUCA (last universal common ancestor).
Multicellular integration. Cells → tissues → organs → organism. 3D coordinated body. Homeostasis.
Life makes more life. DNA replication. Cell division. Sexual/asexual reproduction. Lineage = 1D through time.
Energy extraction and transformation. Food → ATP. Catabolism + anabolism. Linear flow of energy through organism.
Life changes through time. Variation (mutation) + selection (survival) → adaptation. 4D tree of life branching through time.
Network of living organisms interacting. Food webs, symbiosis, competition. 2D graph of relationships. Energy and matter cycling.
Population that can interbreed. Genetic continuity. 2D cluster in genetic space. Speciation = splitting of clusters.
Life becoming aware of itself. Subjective experience. Hard problem. 5D emergence from 3D substrate. Universe observing itself.
Maturana & Varela: life = self-producing system. Network produces components that produce network. Circular causality. Self-referential.
Life = negative entropy. Schrödinger: 'Life feeds on negative entropy.' Local decrease in entropy by exporting it. Dissipative structures (Prigogine).
Historical idea: life = special force (élan vital, chi, prana). Rejected by modern biology (life = chemistry + physics) but persists in alternative medicine. 5D essence?

fractal_structure.self_similarity: Life patterns repeat at all scales: molecular self-replication, cellular reproduction, organismal breeding, species evolution, biosphere as super-organism. Same ∅ → • → sustained coherence.

composition.nested_life: Cells inside organisms inside ecosystems inside biosphere. Holobionts (organism + microbiome). Life within life.
composition.fractal: Each level exhibits life properties: self-maintenance, self-reproduction, adaptation. Cells are alive. Organisms are alive. Species? Gaia?
composition.hierarchical: Lower levels constrain higher. Higher levels organize lower. Circular causality.

key_insights.life_is_process_not_thing: Life = verb not noun. Living not being. Process of maintaining coherence against entropy.
key_insights.life_is_chemistry: No vitalism needed. Life = complex chemistry. Self-organizing chemical reactions. No magic ingredient.
key_insights.life_fights_entropy_locally: 2nd law: entropy increases. Life: builds order. Resolution: exports entropy to environment. Dissipative structures.
key_insights.evolution_is_tinkering: Not optimal design. Jury-rigged solutions. Historical contingency. 'Good enough' not 'perfect'.
key_insights.cooperation_as_important_as_competition: Traditional view: evolution = competition. Reality: cooperation equally important. Symbiosis, multicellularity, eusociality.
key_insights.life_is_network: No organism is island. All embedded in webs of relationships. Microbiome inside, ecosystem outside. Network nodes.
key_insights.information_central: DNA = information storage. Reproduction = information copying. Evolution = information processing. Life = information patterns.
key_insights.consciousness_emergent: Not separate from life. Life becoming aware of itself. Brain = matter organized to enable experience.
key_insights.life_is_planetary: Biosphere = single interconnected system. Gaia hypothesis. Life shapes environment shapes life.
key_insights.artificial_life_possible: If life = self-organizing information patterns, then possible in silicon, not just carbon. AI as life?

medicine.understanding_disease: Disease = breakdown of coherence. Infection, cancer, degeneration. Medicine = restoring coherence.
medicine.prevention: Support life's self-maintenance. Nutrition, exercise, sleep, stress management.
medicine.treatment: Help body heal itself. Life wants to live. Support natural processes.
medicine.regenerative_medicine: Stem cells, tissue engineering. Harnessing life's self-organizing capacity.

biotechnology.genetic_engineering: CRISPR, synthetic biology. Rewriting code of life. Enormous power and responsibility.
biotechnology.biofuels: Life converts solar energy. Can engineer organisms to produce useful chemicals.
biotechnology.bioremediation: Life cleans up pollution. Bacteria eating oil spills.
biotechnology.biomimicry: Learn from life's 3.8 billion years of R&D. Spider silk, photosynthesis, self-healing materials.

agriculture.regenerative_agriculture: Work with life, not against. Build soil, not deplete. Biodiversity, not monoculture.
agriculture.permaculture: Design systems mimicking ecosystems. Self-sustaining, productive.
agriculture.lab_grown_meat: Cell culture. Life without killing. Ethical and environmental benefits.
agriculture.vertical_farming: Controlled environment. Optimize conditions for plant life.

philosophy.reverence_for_life: Schweitzer: ethics = reverence for life. Life recognizing life as sacred.
philosophy.biocentric_ethics: Not just human-centered. All life has value. Deep ecology.
philosophy.transhumanism: Enhance human life beyond biological limits. Cybernetics, genetics, longevity.
philosophy.meaning_of_life: Life's meaning = living. Being alive is meaning. No separate purpose needed.

origin_of_life.rna_world: RNA first. Can store information AND catalyze. DNA and proteins came later.
origin_of_life.metabolism_first: Metabolic cycles before replication. Autocatalytic networks.
origin_of_life.panspermia: Life arrived from space. Pushes question back but doesn't answer ultimate origin.
origin_of_life.hydrothermal_vents: Deep sea vents provided energy and chemistry. Alkaline vents as chemical reactors.

evolution.darwin_natural_selection: Variation + selection = adaptation. Cornerstone of biology.
evolution.modern_synthesis: Darwinism + genetics. Gene as unit of selection.
evolution.neutral_theory: Most mutations neutral. Genetic drift important.
evolution.evo_devo: Development shapes evolution. HOX genes, modularity, evolvability.

astrobiology.drake_equation: Estimating intelligent life in galaxy. Many unknowns.
astrobiology.habitable_zones: Goldilocks zone. Liquid water. Not too hot, not too cold.
astrobiology.biosignatures: Detecting life on exoplanets. Oxygen, methane combinations.
astrobiology.fermi_paradox: If life common, where is everyone? Great Filter?

philosophical_notes.schrodinger_what_is_life: 'Life feeds on negative entropy.' Physical basis of life. Quantum biology.
philosophical_notes.bergson_creative_evolution: Élan vital. Life = creative force. Evolution not mechanical but creative. Vitalism.
philosophical_notes.teilhard_omega_point: Evolution = increasing complexity and consciousness. Converging toward Omega Point (God). Cosmic optimism.
philosophical_notes.gaia_lovelock: Earth = super-organism. Life regulates environment. Biosphere as self-regulating system.
philosophical_notes.dawkins_selfish_gene: Gene = unit of selection. Organisms = vehicles for genes. Gene's-eye view of evolution.
philosophical_notes.maturana_varela_autopoiesis: Life = self-producing system. Circular organization. Cognition = life.
philosophical_notes.kauffman_self_organization: Order for free. Complexity emerges spontaneously. Edge of chaos.
philosophical_notes.prigogine_dissipative_structures: Far from equilibrium, systems self-organize. Life = dissipative structure.
philosophical_notes.nagel_mind_and_cosmos: Teleology in nature? Evolution toward consciousness? Controversial.
philosophical_notes.dennett_universal_acid: Evolution = universal acid. Dissolves all mysteries. Explains everything living.

warnings: Origin of life still not fully understood - active research area
Consciousness emergence from life - hard problem remains
Vitalism largely rejected but energy/information aspects unclear
Astrobiology speculative until we find life elsewhere
info: Module complete with 12 reductions across dimensions
Origin, cell, organism, reproduction, metabolism, evolution covered
Practical applications in medicine, biotech, agriculture, philosophy
Major theories: origin, evolution, major transitions, astrobiology

external.citation: Darwin, C. (1859). On the Origin of Species
Maturana, H. & Varela, F. (1980). Autopoiesis and Cognition
Lovelock, J. (1979). Gaia: A New Look at Life on Earth
Kauffman, S. (1995). At Home in the Universe
